title: A string of rapes sparks protests in India
text:
A string of rapes sparks protests in India 11:10am BST - 01:27 
Days after a lawmaker from the ruling Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) was arrested in connection with a teenager's rape, a sexual attack on an 11-year-old girl was reported on Sunday in Gujarat, the latest in a string of cases that have sparked protests across the country. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Days after a lawmaker from the ruling Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) was arrested in connection with a teenager's rape, a sexual attack on an 11-year-old girl was reported on Sunday in Gujarat, the latest in a string of cases that have sparked protests across the country.
